id003: You found the third clue. Keep going!
id004: Boom clap, the sound of my heart
id005: The beat goes on and on and on and on and
id006: Boom clap, you make me feel good
id007: Come on to me, come on to me now
id008: You are the light and I will follow
id009: You let me lose my shadow
id010: You are the sun, the glowing halo
